detaileddescription.para: This package provide a CMake macros which looks for the Boost libraries.
Inside your CMakeLists.txt one can use: SET(BOOST_COMPONENTS <Boost components list>) SEARCH_FOR_BOOST(BOOST_COMPONENTS)
or in lower case: set(BOOST_COMPONENTS <Boost components list>) search_for_boost()
This will already define for you the path to the include directories for Boost. It provide the variable BOOST_LIBRARIES in order to use the Boost component.
